verses.verse: Now <WG1161> we <WG2249> who are strong <WG1415> ought <WG3784> to bear <WG941> the weaknesses <WG771> of the weak, <WG102> and <WG2532> not <WG3361> to please <WG700> ourselves. <WG1438>
Let <WG700> each one <WG1538> of us <WG2257> please <WG700> his neighbor <WG4139> for <WG1519> that which is good, <WG18> to <WG4314> be building him up. <WG3619>

For <WG1063> even <WG2532> Christ <WG5547> didn't <WG3756> please <WG700> himself. <WG1438> But, <WG235> as <WG2531> it is written, <WG1125> "The reproaches <WG3680> of those who reproached <WG3679> you <WG4571> fell <WG1968> on <WG1909> me. <WG1691>"

For <WG1063> whatever things <WG3745> were written before were written <WG4270> for <WG1519> our <WG2251> learning, <WG4270> that <WG2443> through <WG1223> patience <WG5281> and <WG2532> through <WG1223> encouragement <WG3874> of the Scriptures <WG1124> we might have <WG2192> hope. <WG1680>

Now <WG1161> the God <WG2316> of patience <WG5281> and <WG2532> of encouragement <WG3874> grant <WG1325> you <WG5213> to be <WG846> of the same mind <WG5426> one <WG1722> with another <WG240> according to <WG2596> Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424>

that <WG2443> with one <WG1520> accord <WG3661> you may <WG1392> with <WG1722> one <WG1520> mouth <WG4750> glorify <WG1392> the God <WG2316> and Father <WG3962> of <WG2962> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>
Therefore <WG1352> accept <WG4355> one another, <WG240> even as <WG2531> Christ <WG5547> also <WG2532> accepted <WG4355> you, <WG2248> to <WG1519> the glory <WG1391> of God. <WG2316>

Now <WG1161> I say that <WG3004> Christ <WG5547> has <WG1096> been <WG1096> made a servant <WG1249> of the circumcision <WG4061> for <WG5228> the truth <WG225> of God, <WG2316> that <WG1519> he might confirm <WG950> the promises <WG1860> given to the fathers, <WG3962>

and <WG1161> that <WG1392> the Gentiles <WG1484> might glorify <WG1392> God <WG2316> for <WG5228> his mercy. <WG1656> As <WG2531> it is written, <WG1125> "Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> will I give praise <WG1843> to you <WG4671> among <WG1722> the Gentiles, <WG1484> and <WG2532> sing <WG5567> to <WG3686> your <WG4675> name. <WG3686>"
<WG2532> Again <WG3825> he says, <WG3004> "Rejoice, <WG2165> you Gentiles, <WG1484> with <WG3326> his <WG846> people. <WG2992>"
<WG2532> Again, <WG3825> "Praise <WG134> the Lord, <WG2962> all <WG3956> you Gentiles! <WG1484> <WG2532> Let all <WG3956> the peoples <WG2992> praise <WG1867> him. <WG846>"

<WG2532> Again, <WG3825> Isaiah <WG2268> says, <WG3004> "There will be <WG2071> the root <WG4491> of Jesse, <WG2421> <WG2532> he who arises <WG450> to rule over <WG757> the Gentiles; <WG1484> in <WG1909> him <WG846> the Gentiles <WG1484> will <WG1679> hope. <WG1679>"

Now <WG1161> may the God <WG2316> of hope <WG1680> fill <WG4137> you <WG5209> with <WG5479> all <WG3956> joy <WG5479> and <WG2532> peace <WG1515> in <WG1722> believing, <WG4100> that <WG1519> you <WG5209> may abound <WG4052> in <WG1722> hope, <WG1680> in <WG1722> the power <WG1411> of the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit. <WG4151>

<WG1161> I <WG1473> myself <WG846> am also <WG2532> persuaded <WG3982> about <WG4012> you, <WG5216> my <WG3450> brothers, <WG80> that <WG3754> you <WG2075> yourselves are <WG2075> <WG2532> full <WG3324> of goodness, <WG19> filled <WG4137> with <WG1108> all <WG3956> knowledge, <WG1108> able <WG1410> also <WG2532> to admonish <WG3560> others. <WG240>

But <WG1161> <WG99999> I write <WG1125> the more boldly <WG5112> to you <WG5213> in <WG575> part, <WG3313> as <WG5613> reminding <WG1878> you, <WG5209> because of <WG1223> the grace <WG5485> that was given <WG1325> to me <WG3427> by <WG5259> God, <WG2316>

that <WG1519> I <WG3165> should be <WG1511> a servant <WG3011> of Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> to <WG1519> the Gentiles, <WG1484> serving <WG2418> as a priest the Good News <WG2098> of God, <WG2316> that <WG2443> the offering up <WG4376> of the Gentiles <WG1484> might be <WG1096> made acceptable, <WG2144> sanctified <WG37> by <WG1722> the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit. <WG4151>
I have <WG2192> therefore <WG3767> my boasting <WG2746> in <WG2746> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> in <WG2746> things pertaining <WG3588> to <WG4314> God. <WG2316>

For <WG1063> I will <WG5111> not <WG3756> dare <WG5111> to speak <WG2980> of any things <WG5100> except those which <WG3739> Christ <WG5547> worked <WG2716> through <WG1223> me, <WG1700> for the obedience <WG5218> of the Gentiles, <WG1484> by <WG1223> word <WG3056> and <WG2532> deed, <WG2041>

in <WG1722> the power <WG1411> of signs <WG4592> and <WG2532> wonders, <WG5059> in <WG1722> the power <WG1411> of God <WG2316>'s Spirit; <WG4151> so <WG5620> that from <WG575> Jerusalem, <WG2419> and <WG2532> around <WG2945> as far as to <WG3360> Illyricum, <WG2437> I <WG3165> have fully preached <WG4137> the Good News <WG2098> of Christ; <WG5547>

yes, <WG1161> making it my aim <WG5389> to <WG3779> preach the Good News, <WG2097> not <WG3756> where <WG3699> Christ <WG5547> was already named, <WG2443> that <WG3361> I might not build <WG3618> on <WG1909> another <WG245>'s foundation. <WG2310>

But, <WG235> as <WG2531> it is written, <WG1125> "They will see, <WG3700> to whom <WG3739> no <WG3756> news <WG312> of <WG4012> him <WG846> came. <WG312> <WG2532> They <WG3739> who <WG191> haven't <WG3756> heard <WG191> will understand. <WG4920>"
Therefore <WG1352> also <WG2532> I was <WG4183> hindered <WG1465> these many <WG4183> times from coming <WG2064> to <WG4314> you, <WG5209>

but <WG1161> now, <WG3570> no longer having <WG2192> any place <WG5117> in <WG1722> these <WG5125> regions, <WG2824> and <WG1161> having <WG2192> these <WG575> many <WG4183> years <WG2094> a longing <WG1974> to <WG4314> come <WG2064> to <WG4314> you, <WG5209>

whenever <WG1437> I journey <WG4198> to <WG1519> Spain, <WG4681> I will come <WG2064> to <WG4314> you. <WG5209> For <WG1063> I hope <WG1679> to see <WG2300> you <WG5209> on my journey, <WG1279> and <WG2532> to be helped on my way <WG4311> there <WG1563> by <WG5259> you, <WG5216> if <WG1437> first <WG4412> I may <WG1705> <WG3313> enjoy <WG1705> <WG575> your company for a while. <WG5216>
But <WG1161> now, <WG3570> I say, <WG4198> I am going to <WG1519> Jerusalem, <WG2419> serving <WG1247> the saints. <WG40>

For <WG1063> it has been the good pleasure <WG2106> of Macedonia <WG3109> and <WG2532> Achaia <WG882> to make <WG4160> a <WG2842> certain <WG5100> contribution <WG2842> for <WG1519> the poor <WG4434> among the saints <WG40> who are <WG3588> at <WG1722> Jerusalem. <WG2419>

Yes, <WG1063> it has been their good pleasure, <WG2106> and <WG2532> they are <WG1526> their <WG846> debtors. <WG3781> For <WG1063> if <WG1487> the Gentiles <WG1484> have been made partakers of <WG2841> their <WG846> spiritual things, <WG4152> they owe <WG3784> it to them also <WG2532> to serve <WG3008> them <WG846> in <WG1722> fleshly things. <WG4559>

When <WG2005> therefore <WG3767> I have accomplished <WG2005> this, <WG5124> and <WG2532> have sealed <WG4972> to them <WG846> this <WG5126> fruit, <WG2590> I will go <WG565> on by <WG1223> way of you <WG5216> to <WG1519> Spain. <WG4681>

<WG1161> I know <WG1492> that, <WG3754> when I come <WG2064> to <WG4314> you, <WG5209> I will come <WG2064> in <WG1722> the fullness <WG4138> of the blessing <WG2129> of the Good News <WG2098> of Christ. <WG5547>

Now <WG1161> I beg <WG3870> you, <WG5209> brothers, <WG80> by <WG1223> our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> and <WG2532> by <WG1223> the <WG1223> love <WG26> of the Spirit, <WG4151> that you strive together <WG4865> with me <WG3427> in <WG1722> your prayers <WG4335> to <WG4314> God <WG2316> for <WG5228> me, <WG1700>

that <WG2443> I may be delivered <WG4506> from <WG575> those who are disobedient <WG544> in <WG1722> Judea, <WG2449> and <WG2532> that <WG2443> my <WG3450> service <WG1248> which <WG3588> I have for <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2419> may be <WG1096> acceptable <WG2144> to the saints; <WG40>

that <WG2443> I may come <WG2064> to <WG4314> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> joy <WG5479> through <WG1223> the will <WG2307> of God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> together with <WG4875> you, <WG5213> find rest. <WG4875>
Now <WG1161> the God <WG2316> of peace <WG1515> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216> all. <WG3956> Amen. <WG281>
